'''0.29_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on October 30, 2009.<ref name=":0">{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170206004942/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/228135800/client-02902-is-out-fixing-the-disconnect-bug|title=Client 0.29_02 is out, fixing the disconnect bug |website=The Word of Notch |date=October 30, 2009}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|z1oBQ9Adblk|Minecraft Star Trek||meizlizard - November 1, 2009}}</ref> This version is not available in the launcher, but has been archived elsewhere.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed bug that caused most people in servers to disconnect.<ref name=":0"/>

== Trivia ==
* 0.29_02 can be changed to Survival mode by editing the <code>Minecraft.class</code> file in <samp>[[minecraft.jar]]</samp>.
* 0.29_02 came out exactly one year before the [[Halloween Update]].
